Package org.turbogwt.mvp.databind

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Binder
    It defines an object that supports binding.
    Binding<T>
    Manager responsible for binding property accessors, validators and formatters to model properties.
    DatabindUiHandler
    An interface that must be implemented by the Presenter supporting databind.
    DatabindValidationHandler
    This interface allows the (databind) view to handle the two possible validation events.
    DatabindView
    Interface that must be implemented by the View to support databind.
    HasDatabindUiHandler  
    HasDatabindValues
    An object that implements this interface should be a widget with values mapped by String keys, named ids.
    PropertyBinder<T>
    A Binder that supports binding property accessors, validators and formatters to a property id.
    WidgetBinder  
    WidgetBindingStrategy
    Represents a strategy of binding some command execution to a widget event.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BinderRegistration
    A default HandlerRegistrarion implementation to be used by Binders.
    BindingImpl<T>
    Manager responsible for binding property accessors, validators and formatters to model properties.
    DatabindViewEngine
    This class should be used by any DatabindView as a delegatee.
    DatabindViewImpl
    DatabindView default implementation.
    PresenterEngine<T>  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Strategy
    It is responsible for performing the binding on the widget.
